Darkfate:

He joined to Killfest and Drillbit. His opinion about Hellbeast's 
Predacons was bad and his opinion about Maximals was worse; but he 
didn't said nothing. He joined to Killfest and Drillbit "Well..." 
said at last with disgust tone "What do you think about this 
alliance???"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest listens to Angel Prime's offer, thinking it over for a 
> moment and keeping the expression on his face neutral. He nods at 
> DrillBit's request to discuss the matter, and turns from Angel 
Prime. 
> Once he was sure that Angel Prime couldn't see his face, it relaxed 
> into the look of disgust that showed his opinion of the offer. 
> Killfest didn't like Maximals. Attacking Hell Beast's forces and 
> indirectly helping the Maximals was one thing, but allying with 
them 
> was quite another.
> 
> He walks up to DrillBit, waiting for Darkfate to join them.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > He looked to the others. The idea had one problem. The DrillBit 
and
> > DarkFate wanted an alliance with the Alliance. DB wasn't sure what
> > Killfest thought.
> > "A momement for us do discuss, please."
> > He walked off a little bit, and motioned for Killfest and 
DarkFate 
> to
> > follow.
